MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY16 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in Bettws Cedewain. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:30PM due to a faulty transformer. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:43pm on 22nd October 2020.
